entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains this evening. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
